divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting home because of unemployment.decided to look up mufon because i believe in ufo's.what made me notice this event was a posting from peru,indianapolis.i looked through my binoculars and noticed these star like spheres flying,changing direction, and some flying in formation.i was surprised and amazed that the person reporting this was right.i am still watching.wonder how long this will last?this isn't my first encounter with ufo's and hopefully not my last!
Summary: Star like objects flying past the sun.
